name: backend
description: TaskTracker is a simple yet powerful web application designed to help individuals and teams manage their tasks efficiently. It allows users to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) tasks, organize them by status or priority, and track progress over time. Built with a modular backend using NestJS and a database for persistent storage, TaskTracker is structured for easy scalability, making it a strong foundation for more advanced features like user authentication, team collaboration, and notifications in future phases.
author: Vinit Shah
